_header: O fairest flower O flower of flowers all
_description: Charles d’Orléans, a criticism of his mistress — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy (abab)

BLHar682.First Lines:
O Fayrist flowre o flowre of flowris alleWhos fresheli coloure
                    meynt twene whit & red…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…For if y kan amende it lo y wolIf y not may y sory am
                    therfore
